name: HCore
description:
Goals:

- Drop all WHITE CORES to the bottom of the screen.
- Don't drop even a single PURPLE CORE.

4 Means of beating the game:
- Move cores with MOVERS!
- Push them with PUSHERS!
- Convert purple cores into white ones with CONVERTERS!
- Think how to do it right with your THINKER!

Complete 36 different levels.
Each level has a 3-star rating system (less turns - more stars).
You should try to get all of theese stars because all prize stars are taken from the sky.
